attributes.title: this app deserves a 1 star review
attributes.review: absolutely disgusting that people want a 🍊 to be president of the united states. why would we vote for 4 more years of disappointment and bs? thanks for trying to make america great again, next time try harder if you get the chance💗

attributes.title: it’s all propaganda!!
attributes.review: i opened up this app to learn more about trump’s stance on the issues in politics but it just seemed like he was just producing a ton of propaganda about white superiority. was very disappointed in the apps portrayal of the president. i think he would be unhappy with his image on this app.

attributes.title: my cat died
attributes.review: when i opened this app my cat died because she was greeted with trumps face. this is not okay some people (and cats) can have HEART ATTACKS. no more jump scares please.

attributes.title: Barf
attributes.review: I really think Apple should take this app down, super buggy and the content is so disgraceful.

attributes.title: Hate this app
attributes.review: My brain scrambles whenever I read anything posted on here

attributes.title: Didn’t like the vibe
attributes.review: Horrible app, made my phone glitch. This app makes me want to jump off a bridge 💕✨🧚🏽🥰😜

attributes.title: Garbage app
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a huge virus and I hope it’s taken down as nobody deserves this online of Garbage

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Only thing worse than this app is the president.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE ✨
attributes.review: do not download this app, first of all this dusty cheeto ugly musty man is by far THE WORST president to ever exist on earth. also he’s racist, sexist, misogynistic, and wants to kill all americans by telling them to not wear a mask😍😍
